name: Image Juxtaposition
description: Compare two images with a slider. Perfect for before/after comparisons, historical changes, and visual analysis.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate comparison image descriptions

before.description: string - Description of 'before' image (for AI generation)
before.label: string - Label for before image

after.description: string - Description of 'after' image (for AI generation)
after.label: string - Label for after image

before.description: A lush green Amazon rainforest with dense tree canopy viewed from above

after.description: Same area with large patches of cleared land and scattered remaining trees

conversion_notes.image_dimensions: Both images should have the same dimensions
conversion_notes.slider_position: Starting position is percentage from left (50 = center)
conversion_notes.labels: Labels appear on each side of the slider
